section.heading: Liability of partner and person dissociated as partner when claim against limited liability partnership is barred.
section.text: If a claim against a dissolved limited liability partnership is barred under § 29-608.08(c), 29-608.09(c), or 29-608.10, any corresponding claim under § 29-603.06, 29-607.03, or 29-608.06 is also barred.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
